c.t: No job too big for Agent 009!
I am a double agent!
Nobody worked out my triple identity!
The micro-film is in my underpants!
I'll never talk!
Another brilliantly successful mission!
I'm going to hack into the system and take over the DB. Piece of cake!
Sorry, I knew that already!
You are the most pathetic bad guy in history!
Haha, I've never been hit between the legs with a laser!
BOOM! Invisible mode. Your security system is officially worthless!
Why are female spies always drop-dead gorgeous?
I've only got 30 seconds left to defuse the bomb!
Your mission should you choose to accept it... whatever, no worries. I got this!
I'm not who you think I am, which isn't great for you either...
My watch contains a miniature detonator!
I am the man of a thousand faces, nobody knows my true identity!
I travel so much that the earth is my playing field!
My contact is in Copacabana... again!
I'm being followed. The situation is critical... Or not!
An XYZ cocktail on the rocks please!
I dedicate this Oscar to my family!
And that's another victory for the sacred tree feller!
In life, there are two kinds of people. Those who've got it and those who don't!
I've waited for this moment all my life. Now, finally, recognition!
I play the role of a brain-eating psychopath... Bleeuugh!
I do my own stunts!
No photos please!
The camera flashes light me up as bright as day!
And there you go, divorce number 5!
I've adopted 12 children... What are they called again?
If I'd had relations with that woman, I'd know about it!
We met in which film again?
I have to choose between Burton and Scorcese, what should I do?
If I want to cry in a scene, I pull out some nose hair!
Gossip journalists know more about my life than I do!
Would you like an autograph?
I know Mr Willis well, we saved the world together once!
It feels strange to be 1/3 of the film's production budget?
Come and visit me in California or Cathcart!
I'm an actor, producer, director and extra all at once!
Another magnificent goal. My bonus just went up!
One more header, one less neuron, a boost to the bonus!
A three-pointer from the other end of the court - too easy!
Oh say can you see by the dawn's... what comes next?!
My father was a famous footballer - life's been tough for me!
I told Tiger to go and look for me in the woods for me!
I have to film an ad for chocolate? Is this a joke?
My racquet is an extension of my body. I sleep with it!
I wouldn't mind a bit more EPO!
Médaille d'or au curling, la classe !
Feel the rhythm! Feel the rhyme! Get on up, its bobsled time...
I declare this Olympic games open. No no no, don't thank me!
I dedicate this victory to my mother!
Multi-Strike a perfect score. One!
Watch out - I'm on my way, this crowd will go crazy when I get here!
A gentle stroll, 100m in 8 seconds. Standard.
Right hook, stinging uppercut, opponent on the canvas, KO!
A winning smash, and a standing ovation at Roland Garros!
When I retire, I'll be the minister for sport!
Onward to the... Falcon shooting, YEAAAHHH!
Quelle maîtrise, quel talent, je suis le meilleur !
Mon tube est disque d'or avant même d'être sorti !
Un petit solo à la guitare, la scène est hypnotisée !
Je remplis le stade de France quand je veux !
Et je chante, je danse, jusqu'au bout de la nuit !
Je suis en tournée dans le monde entier !
Après Paris, New-York et Londres, en avant pour Tokyo !
Mon timbre de voix est si puissant qu'il fait trembler les murs !
Ma chanson est traduite dans plus de langues que la Bible !
La page web de mon groupe de Rock a plus d'un million de vues !
Je viens de composer ma 9ème symphonie !
Avec ça, je mériterai ma place parmi les Enfoirés !
Pas besoin de micro, ma voix porte à 3 km !
Zazie me demande encore un duo !
Il manque encore une corde à mon Stradivarius pour que je puisse exprimer tout mon talent !
Chef d'orchestre de l'opéra de Prague, y'a pire comme boulot !
J'ai tourné le clip de mon dernier titre en Polynésie française, la vie est belle !
Mon tube est premier au Top50 depuis l'année dernière !
Après U2, c'est décidé je me lance en solo, appelez moi U1 !
On m'a demandé de donner un concert lors de l'ouverture des JO !
